name: Barleybloom Village
visual_description: A peaceful tribal village in a fertile valley. Thatched-roof buildings around a central gathering area. Gardens and small farms surround the settlement. An ancient anima tree grows at the village heart, surrounded by glowing anima grass. Warm, welcoming atmosphere. Simple but comfortable life.
reference_prompt: A peaceful tribal village nestles in a fertile valley, thatched-roof buildings of wood and stone arranged around a central gathering area with a fire pit. Small gardens and carefully tended farms surround the settlement, showing generations of agricultural knowledge. At the village heart, an ancient anima tree rises with otherworldly grace, its trunk marked with carved symbols, surrounded by a ring of softly glowing anima grass. Villagers in practical woven clothing tend to daily tasks. Warm golden afternoon light filters through the anima tree's canopy, while the grass below pulses with gentle psychic luminescence. Style: Pastoral tribal settlement, mystical naturalism. Mood: Peaceful, welcoming, ancestral, doomed.
key_visual_elements: central gathering area with fire pit

lighting.day: warm natural light filtered through tree

note: This village is destroyed by the Empire as punishment for sheltering Cora and Howen
